attributes.action: Stop the proposed service changes to the elderly and vulnerable in Wolverhampton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please stop Wolverhampton city council from the proposed  service changes as a result of the Government’s ‘Fairer Contributions’ act. 
Recently as a result of a petition to save Underhill house from closing Gordon Brown said "there needed to be a consultation to ensure the right legislative measures for every old person to have dignity and security that they want in retirement" So surely these proposed changes should wait until  after this new consultation and therefore would avoid unnecessary upset once again to the elderly and vulnerable of Wolverhampton.
